s0001: Wan Shi Jun named Fen, his father Zhao person, surname Shi clan.
s0003: Gao Zu east strike Xiang Ji, pass He Nei, at time Fen year fifteen, become small li, serve Gao Zu.
s0004: Gao Zu with speak, love his respectful reverence, ask said: 'You have what?'
s0005: Answer said: 'Fen alone have mother, unfortunately lose sight.
s0007: Have elder sister, able drum zither.'
s0008: Gao Zu said: 'You able follow me?'
s0010: Then Gao Zu summon his elder sister become beauty, with Fen become zhong jian, receive book ye, move his family Chang An Zhong Qi Li, with elder sister become beauty reason.
s0011: His official reach Xiao Wen time, accumulate merit labor reach da zhong da fu.
s0012: No literature, respectful cautious no equal compare.
s0013: Wen Di time, Dong Yang Hou Zhang Xiang Ru become crown prince tai fu, free.
s0014: Select able become fu, all push Fen, Fen become crown prince tai fu.
s0015: Reach Xiao Jing establish, become nine qing;
s0016: Press close, fear him, move Fen become feudal lord xiang.
s0017: Fen long son Jian, next son Jia, next son Yi, next son Qing, all with tame conduct filial cautious, officials all reach two thousand dan.
s0018: Then Jing Di said: 'Shi Jun and four sons all two thousand dan, person minister honor favor then collect his gate.'
s0019: Number Fen become Wan Shi Jun.
s0020: Xiao Jing Di last years, Wan Shi Jun with shang da fu lu return old at home, with year season become court minister.
